works_for.name: <name of who it works for>
works_for.tagline: <a marketing tagline for who it works for>
works_for.metadata: <What you do with this is up to you programmatically, as the schema of the metadata is unknown to us. You can use this to put services or skills, or whatever you'd like.>

model: <defaults to gpt-3.5-turbo, the chat model you'd like to use for your chat completion, models listed here https://platform.openai.com/docs/models/model-endpoint-compatibility>
